about_the_game:
"

FG Haunted Places Map Pack


The Haunted Places Maps Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools.
This map pack consists of nearly 100 images that can be used to create or enhance existing maps to more classic haunted locations. This pack includes the following items:




  • Brushes of boards, borders, chains, wooden platforms, stone walls, and more
  • Decorations of large roots, coffins, sarcophagi, stone elements, braziers, torches, and more
  • Fills of three types of stone floors
  • Animated fills of glowing particles, decorations of spider webs, insect swarms, bats, and more
"
